"Dinar":
"Having trouble with the gun controls.
Withdrawing for the moment."
"Recon flight in progress."
"Currently in recon formation."
"Dropping relief supplies."
"A heat source in these supplies...?"
"Target confirmed, sweeping fire."

"Damn... I can't stay in the air
any longer! Emergency landing!"

"Help me while I start
fixing the damage."

"I can't just abandon the craft
here. I'm relying on you to
cover me during the repairs."

"Enemy signs from the front.
Deal with them, please."

"Enemy signs from the right.
Deal with them, please."

"Enemy signs from behind.
Deal with them, please."

"Enemy signs from the left.
Deal with them, please."

"The damage is getting worse.
I can't hold out much longer."

"That's it... the craft's a goner.
I'm getting out of here."

"Confirmed recovery of controls.
Thanks for the save."

"Strange, the output's dropping!?
I'm landing again, cover me!"

"Looks like there was more damage
than I thought... I'm carrying out
temporary repairs, cover me again!"
"Any more damage would be bad..."

"This is it... this craft
is beyond repair."

"Sorry for the trouble.
All systems are go,
thanks for the help!"

"What the...?! I've lost control!
This is an emergency! Abandon ship!"

"Having trouble with the
instruments. I'm going
to withdraw temporarily."
"Searching for enemy signs."
"Flying in recon formation."
"Relief supplies are being dropped."
"Something odd about those supplies..."
"Target confirmed. Commencing attack."
"Damn it... the controls are...! Emergency landing!"

"Carrying out some quick repairs.
Asking for cover in the meantime."

"She's in bad shape, should be able to
fix it though. I want you to buy me
some time so I can repair her."

"Enemy signs from the front.
Deal with them, please."

"Enemy signs from the right.
Deal with them, please."

"Enemy signs from behind.
Deal with them, please."

"Enemy signs from the left.
Deal with them, please."

"Getting hit in too many places.
She can't take any more of this!"
"This is it... Evacuate!"

"Temporary repairs completed.
Thanks for the prompt assist."

"Confirmed emergency stoppage of engine drive!
Damn it all, I'm landing again!"

"Performing repairs again. I
just want you to protect me
during the temporary repairs."
"Any more damage would be bad..."

"This is it... this craft
is beyond repair."

"Sorry for the trouble.
All systems are go,
thanks for the help!"

"What the...?! I've lost control!
This is an emergency! Abandon ship!"

"Getting some trouble, don't
know what's causing it.
Retreating for the moment."
"Recon mission in progress."
"In enemy search formation."
"Passing on relief supplies."
"This one is heavier than normal..."
"Target confirmed."

"I haven't got... damn it!
Emergency landing!"

"I want you to cover
me during the
emergency repairs."

"It should fly again... Need some
assistance during the repairs."

"Enemy signs from the front.
Deal with them, please."

"Enemy signs from the right.
Deal with them, please."

"Enemy signs from behind.
Deal with them, please."

"Enemy signs from the left.
Deal with them, please."

"She can't take any more.
Requesting urgent backup."

"This is it... Evacuate,
I'll call for backup!"

"It's makeshift, but she'll fly.
Thanks for the save."

"Engine thrust is falling...! Damn,
coming in for another landing!"

"My repairs weren't enough.
Cover me one more time!"
"Any more damage would be bad..."

"This is it... this craft

"Sorry for the trouble.
